message: Let's split it evenly to start things off!
I appreciate the offer for an even split, but I think I can bring more value to the table. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering we both want to get something out of this. Let's compromise!
I understand the need for compromise, but I still believe my contributions are worth a bit more. How about 58/42?
